sentences.en: "Did you find yourself wondering what went wrong?"— 'Precisely.'
sentences.cn: “你是不是自己也在想哪儿出了问题？”——“确实如此。”

sentences.en: "Precisely what other problems do you perceive?" she asked.
sentences.cn: “你究竟还发现了什么问题？”她问道。

sentences.en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

sentences.en: Children come to zoos precisely to see captive animals.
sentences.cn: 孩子们到动物园就是为了看圈养的动物。

sentences.en: Don't stick too precisely to what it says in the book.
sentences.cn: 不要过分拘泥于书上所说的。

sentences.en: It's precisely that sort of slick sales - talk that I mistrust.
sentences.cn: 我不相信的正是那种油腔滑调的推销宣传.

sentences.en: Oddly enough, that is precisely what I intend.
sentences.cn: 说也奇怪, 那正是我的打算.

sentences.en: Our objectives need to be precisely delineated.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标需详细解释清楚。

sentences.en: Precisely . That's just what I had tried to talk her round.
sentences.cn: 就是嘛,我也这么劝过她.

sentences.en: She’s precisely the kind of person we’re looking for.
sentences.cn: 她正是我们要找的那种人。

sentences.en: So you think we ought to wait here? — Precisely.
sentences.cn: 那么你认为我们应该在这儿等 吗 ?——对.

sentences.en: That answers precisely to our needs.
sentences.cn: 那正好适合我们的需要.

sentences.en: That's precisely what I don't want you to do.
sentences.cn: 那恰恰是我不想让你做的.

sentences.en: The meeting began at precisely 4.00 p.m.
They look precisely the same to me.
sentences.cn: 依我看他们的长相一模一样。

sentences.en: Women in these jobs are paid less precisely because most of the jobs are held by women rather than men.
sentences.cn: 从事这些工作的女性报酬之所以较低正是因为做这些工作的人大部分是女性而不是男性。

words.tran_cn: 精度，[数] 精密度；精确

trans.tran_cn: 精确地，恰好地，严谨地，严格地，一丝不苟地
trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that a particular thing is completely true or correct
